parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the membership that contains the ID mapping table.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A name for the ID mapping table.

parameters.name: inputReferenceConfig
parameters.description: The input reference configuration needed to create the ID mapping table. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the referenced resource in Entity Resolution. Valid values are ID mapping workflow ARNs. When TRUE, Clean Rooms manages permissions for the ID mapping table resource. When FALSE, the resource owner manages permissions for the ID mapping table resource.

nested_params.name: inputReferenceArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the referenced resource in Entity Resolution. Valid values are ID mapping workflow ARNs.

nested_params.name: manageResourcePolicies
nested_params.description: When TRUE, Clean Rooms manages permissions for the ID mapping table resource. When FALSE, the resource owner manages permissions for the ID mapping table resource.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional label that you can assign to a resource when you create it. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define. When you use tagging, you can also use tag-based access control in IAM policies to control access to this resource. (string) --- (string) ---
